casebody.data:
Richard SANTOS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 6, 2017

Vishal K. Garg, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Richard Santos' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 788, 171 A.3d 1091 (2017), is denied.
